title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, installable via npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, enabling chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI), offering ChatGPT-like interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama, supporting chat, completions, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API, covering chat, generate, and pull commands.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Rust CLI for Ollama with interactive chat and model browsing.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for CPU and GPU deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot UI for Ollama with streaming and markdown support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build RAG pipelines with Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in Discord servers.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models into Slack channels with app mentions.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node for calling Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama, enabling mobile and desktop apps to run local LLMs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for Ollama.
